channel.description: Recent content in digital Rights on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: IFF Releases Legislative Brief on Digital Rights for the Monsoon Session of the Parliament
item.description: As the Monsoon Session of the Parliament commences, we have prepared our first legislative brief on digital rights to highlight some of the focus areas within the larger issues of data protection and digital rights that call for the extensive deliberation in the houses of the Parliament.
